about_the_game:
A simple text file, that gives the complete walkthrough of the game.

N.b. this text file lists the fastest and most efficient way to complete every ending & epilogue, unlock every image and animation and receive every steam achievement.
We strongly advise players to only use this as a last resort.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Negligee - Walkthrough

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1.66 Ghz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: A complete walkthrough of the Negligee game unlocking all achievements, endings and CG scenes for the game.
